name: Robot Tample
description:
Two companies send their robots acquire treasures. Let's see which one of them bring more. It's a VS game where two players gather points, the one with highest score wins.
Bots fights with use of Waves ( Sonic, Seismic and Gravity)
Jam Site: PolyJam 2017
Jam Year: 2017
Platforms: MS Windows, Mac OS X, Linux / Unix, Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)
Tools And Technologies: Construct 2

Credits:

Bartłomiej "Saper" Czarnak - Designe, Code, Graphics
Çağlar Şahin - Music and Sound Effects
